title: The Chick Wand - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Shoujo   Slice of Life
author: Kirishima Maruha   霧島まるは
description:
There is a test to enter the magician’s school.
Even if I say so, it isn’t a test of knowledge. All you have to do is simply grasp the wand with a milky white stone egg. If you have magical talent, the egg will crack.>
